base_description: Rectangular, gray switch panel with two beige switches.
part_description: Two rectangular beige switches on a gray panel, evenly spaced. Each switch has a small red indicator at the bottom center.
internal_interaction_description: The two switches are mounted on the panel, each with a mechanism allowing them to toggle on and off. The red indicators likely signal the current state of the switches, changing as the switches are toggled.
external_interaction_description: The switch panel is designed to be mounted on a wall. Users interact by pressing the switches to control connected electrical devices, with the red indicators providing a visual cue of the switch state.
